"Hmm... Brute Root... I believe it's used to relax the mind while boosting energy. I hear it is the ingredient including in almost every Mountainian drink. It also keeps the body strong." Danielle said only to realize that she couldn't stop at Lucius.

Danielle snaps herself out of her infatuation and finds fresh growing Brute Root by the pond. "Looks like I found some!"

"Good work lady dignitary. We might as well try to collect some gold. The next item that were looking for is a valuable piece of gold."

The sound of wolves can be heard in the distance. Various grunts and whimpers can be heard as the guests slay the wolves. Lucius and co. are attacked by a wolf. Juno gracefully loads an arrow and pieces the canine in its chest. The wolf whimpers in pain as she collapses.

"Looks like we have wolf meat. Did you see that Lucius darling? Can any other woman use a bow like me?" Juno bragged as she tried to attract Lucius.

Lucius blushes and is unable to give an answer. More howls can be heard from nearby. A few wolf cubs approach their dead mother.

"Poor things. We just killed their mother too. I don't think they're old enough to fend for themselves." Morgaine said as she picks up the frightened wolf cub.

Juno loads a few more arrows. Just when she was about to shoot she was stopped by Danielle.

"Don't kill them. They may help us win this game."

"Nice observation. Wolves make very good hunting dogs. Lucius said as he started petting another frightened wolf cub.

"This should work. I used my magic to make some leases for them. I couldn't find any gold here. Let's keep looking."
154231222111112211111211.title: Arm Yourselves for the Scavenger Hunt

choices: Lucius and his party find the last item on the list
King Hercules starts scolding Cassius and his brothers for being reckless
1542312221111122111112112.content:
Just when Lucius and his party were about to head to town for some flares a mighty roar could be heard in the distance. The wolf cubs start whimpering and trying to escape.

"Do you think what I think it is Luci?"

"Must be a Luck Dragon. This is bad. I've heard legends that they kill men and women and abduct children." Juno said as she readied an arrow.

"Actually Luck Dragons love kids. They're known to protect children regardless of species. It seems like this one is hunting for cattle." Lucius remarked.

Morgaine is flooded with memories of her late husband.

"Could this be the dragon who killed my once beloved Lancelot?"

"Look! Here he comes!"

As the Luck Dragon descended it was clear he was no ordinary Luck Dragon. Standing over 100 feet tall and having scales that were blue and gold set him apart from his brethren. A look of anticipation filled Lucius's eyes. He was going to claim the Luck Dragon as his own.

"You don't see a beautiful Luck Dragon like that everyday. I'm going to catch him and make him a loyal companion." Lucius said as he pulled out some rope.

The Luck Dragon raises an eyebrow. "Fat man say what? Do I look like I want to be captured?" The Luck Dragon replied.

"Did that dragon just talk? How is that possible? None of the books I read ever mentioned this!" Morgaine exclaimed.

The Luck Dragon rolls his eyes. "You really didn't know we can speak your tongue? Then why should our kind speak to you anyway? You think we act on primal instincts. We're the most intelligent creatures to roam the skies."

"Sir Luck Dragon, how about we have a challenge. If I can tie you up before you fly away then you'll be my new partner. If you get away then you're free to go." Lucius said.

"Why would I want to fly away. I came here to snag some cattle. Your kind has been over hunting the wildlife that many us had to migrate to new territories in other countries. How about you try defeating me before I knock the living daylights out of you." The Luck Dragon said as he swung his tail at Lucius.

Lucius readies his weapons. He dodges the Luck Dragon's tail. He begins readying his rope into a lasso. The Luck Dragon swipes his claws. Lucius uses his sword to ward off the attack. The Luck Dragon begins to ready a fireball. Lucius quickly uses his rope to lasso the dragon's mouth closed. The Luck Dragon begins to violently thrash. Lucius stands his ground and jumps onto the dragon's back. He then flicks the dragon on the ear. The Luck Dragon yelps as he ear gets hits by Lucius.

"Give up?"

The Luck Dragon groans.

"Let's go."

The Luck Dragon refuses to budge.

"Bro., Looks like this Luck Dragon is a sore loser."

"He's going to have to move if he wants something to eat. There's plenty of food at my brother's palace. Also his scales will help us win this scavenger hunt that Cassius setup. His scales are more valuable then some golden trinket."

Danielle sighs as she observes Lucius undo the Luck Dragon's muzzle. Juno was impressed with Lucius's spectacular display of talent without getting nicked. Juno began plotting to seduce Lucius even more and mold him into her ideal husband. Morgaine was speechless and shocked that Lucius caught the creature whose species was responsible for Lancelot's death.

"State your name dragon. You must clearly have one since you speak our language."

"The name is Golzure. I hunt at night to avoid poachers and yet I got caught by a human anyway."

"The name's Lucius. Let's work together Golzure."
1542312221111122111112112.title: The Blue and Gold Luck Dragon

choices: The next morning Lucius and his companions leave.
Lucius and his allies make a short visit to the kingdom of Lucia
15423122211111221111121121.content:
After capturing the Luck Dragon, Golzure, it didn't take long to fetch some a few flares. Once Lucius and his team entered town he found a vendor selling some flares. The vendor looks at Lucius with astonishment once he sees the Luck Dragon.

"Good day sir. Do you happen to sell any flares at this fine hour?"

"I do, but how did you catch such a rare beast?"

"I caught this guy fair and square. He was trying to take off with some cattle."

"I see. Normally Luck Dragons don't come in that coloration."

Golzure snorts at the conversation. He despised being treated as a prisoner, but since he was beaten fair and square he couldn't rebel against his new master.

Lucius pays the vendor for the flares. Lucius and his team hop on Golzure's back and fly to the palace. Once there he realized that his group had won the Scavenger hunt.

"Looks like we won Luci."

"It does and please stop calling me that!

"Lucius, I had a fun time tonight. Since were both heading to Fantasmia would you mind accompanying us?" Danielle said.

"I would be most delighted milday."

"I'll go to. It's been awhile since I last seen my sister."

"I'm sure Livia would be glad to have ya."

I will not give up! I will make Lucius mine. Juno thought to herself as her jealousy and lust took over.

It wasn't until thirty minutes later that the other teams arrived. Once they got back they were shocked to see Lucius with Golzure.

"I must say. I think that was the Luck Dragon that we heard earlier." One woman said.

"There's no doubt about that love, but dammit. For a fat man he's probably in more shape than the king. Not only can he outlift King Leviathan, but to capture a Luck Dragon is no simple task." The lady's husband replied.

"He even managed to capture wolf cubs. Wolves make the world's best hunting dogs."

Lucius then sees Cassius address the crowd.

"It looks like we have a clear winner! Congratulations Lord Lucius and his team. I hope tonight's scavenger hunt was a blast. I know my brothers and I enjoyed it. Now for the moment everyone will enjoy. Tonight we'll be having a some fireworks and roasted wolf!"

The crowd cheers as they hand over their dead wolves to be roasted. Lucius then approaches his eldest nephew.

"Cassius, I haven't had that much fun in years."

"Thanks Uncle Lucius. I thought the best way to add some more life to the party was through a challenge. Normally grandfather and father would not approve of nighttime scavenger hunts, but I reasoned as long as the guests were well armed and given medical supplies everything should be fine."

"I have a gift for you and your brothers."

Lucius then brings forth the three wolf cubs, all of whom were terrified.

"We killed their mother and I thought it would not bode well to leave them defenseless and on their own. I'm entrusting these pups into your care. Would you take care of them?"

"You have my word uncle. I give my brothers their wolf cubs. I'll take care of this little guy. Isn't that right Romulus?"

The wolf cub now named Romulus starts panicking as his new owner petting him.

"It's alright little one. You must still be traumatized after tonight. I'll have to feed you something else. We can't have you being a cannibal."

Cassius picks up Romulus and holds the wolf cub in his arms. He then gently rocks Romulus in his arms until he falls asleep.

"That should do it. I'm going to give my bros. their wolves. After two weeks I'll start training them how to hunt."

Cassius walks off with all three wolf cubs in his arms. Lucius and all present enjoy the fireworks and the freshly roasted wolf meat.
15423122211111221111121121.title: Winner of the Scavenger Hunt

choices: Lucius and Danielle leave together the next morning for business in Fantasmia
Lady Juno tells King Hercules about Danielle who is then forced to marry Lucius
15423122211111222.content:
All of the Mountanian nobles gathered to watch the king and and Prince Lucius to see which of the two were the strongest. Lady Juno was watching from the crowd hoping to further seduce the prince to her advantage. Morgaine was also present for she had a bad feeling about Lucius being used as Lady Juno's personal boy toy. Unbeknownst to the two women was a third tall woman who was roughly in her late 30s or early 40s. She wore a cloak over her head but her beautiful blonde hair could easily be seen She was quite tall and busty and would attract any man for she looked fairly young for her age. Her expression was of sadness and grief which caused her to regret being so reckless in her youth. The woman pulled out a locket that had a picture of her and what resembled Prince Lucius in his younger days. The woman watched the the two royals put their all into outdoing each other. They then stop exhausted after a few hours of trying to out lift each other. The mysterious woman then sheds a tear guilty for ruining her own life. The woman remembers as a girl drinking poison to end her life. However it was only half successful. For a magician from Fantasmia had quickly revived her only to be exiled to her mother's native land of Sumotorio a kingdom founded over 100 years ago by a Fatlantian prince along with people from Fantasmia and Mountania in order to form a new nation for the prince's older sibling had right to the throne of Fatlantis.

Sumotorio being a mix of different cultures tends to focus on their national sport and discipline. Most of the residents are actually both buff and fat due to their extensive training. Once the woman arrived years ago to her mother's native country her aunt Queen Natilda scolded the young lass causing her to feel ashamed. Having chosen celibacy her aunt had no heirs until Danielle arrived. Danielle's Aunt Natilda forbade the girl for returning to the other kingdoms until she was ready to apologize to the man whose honor she smeared. This caused Danielle to miss out on her sisters weddings and even her father's funeral 10 years ago. Recently however she's been charged by her aunt to spread the national sport of Sumotorio before being able to be crowned heir. Lucius meanwhile is chatting with Morgaine and is apparently starting to fall for her and out of love with Juno. For Lucius remembered the last time he let a woman manipulate him the pain still fresh in his mind. Danielle also feeling the pain walked away with her men for she had to present herself to King Leviathan tonight to showcase the sport and then leave for Fantasmia the next morning. One of her men was a native Mountanian who had recently lost his memory.

The poor man was one of the few to survive pursuing a Luck Dragon but at a terrible cost. After waking up from his serious wounds a Sumotorion healer found him. When the man awoke he had no memory except for the possibility of a slim chance of having a wife and a child whose names he couldn't remember. He was then nursed back to health and traveled with Danielle and her team to promote their sport. Danielle knowing that people might recognize her because of her name fears that she spark a cold reception with the royal family but she has no choice but to hope that no one recognizes her. She then walks to the guest quarters trying to hold back her tears so she can get ready for tonight's event. Later that night she presents her to the royal court noticing Lucius among the nobility with his younger brother, Lady Juno, and Morgaine.

"Who's that woman? I don't recall seeing her around before." said Lady Juno in a scoffing tone.

"Supposedly she's from a distant kingdom that was founded over 100 years ago. Appaently they want to introduce a new sport of some kind. I heard that it's a form of wrestling that originated from Fatlantis but modified when the nation of Sumotorio was founded." said Morgaine glaring at Lady Juno.

"Thank you people of Mountania. I am here on the behalf of my aunt, Queen Natilda to present Sumotorion wrestling. Originally adapted from sumo wrestling from Fatlantis we are here to prove that it is more than two people body slamming each other. So I'll demonstrate the sport from one of your fellow Mountanians who has some experience. Yet I warn you the man knows not his name for he lost his memory in a terrible accident. Please give it up for our 1st volunteer." said Danielle.

When the volunteer appears she notes that he has a striking resemblance to her late husband but only with longer hair and a a full beard. She then realizes that the man is undoubtedly her husband and is shocked that he was alive. She then feels guilty for turning Prince Lucius on for she had believed her husband to have been dead. Yet she doubts that the man will remember her or his child. Lucius then recognizes the woman. Shocked that it was the same woman who attempted suicide many years ago felt guilty and believed that he had no choice but to make an honest woman out of her. He then rises from his seat to volunteer in hopes of making amends with his teenage sweetheart. Lady Juno noticing the turn of events starts to put two and two together and becomes jealous of the older woman. She then puts together a scheme to reveal to king Hercules that this was the woman that his son had made love with and who apparently tried to kill herself. After the demonstration half of the nobility are impressed while the other half scoffed. Danielle noticing the lukewarm reception heads off to her room trying to avoid looking Lucius in the eye, who was apparently love-struck yet again for the third time.
15423122211111222.title: Evenly Matched Strongmen

choices: Triton gets lost and winds up travelling with his uncles
Triton gets kidnapped by bandits and it's up to Lucius to rescue him
154231222111112221.content:
Later that night Danielle looks at the picture in her locket that was artistically crafted by a talented artist long ago. She then starts sobbing for throwing away the life she could of had. She regrets attempting suicide and wonders what her daughter or son could of been like if he or she was born. She then takes a stroll through the palace to help her forget her terrible past. She then heads to the royal kitchen to fetch herself a glass of water. Normally her aunt's subjects and any suitor would offer to get Danielle whatever she needed only for Danielle to turn them down for she felt that it be best that she do it herself for fear of her aunt catching her alone with a man that she wasn't going to marry and due to her experience with Lucius stating herself if she was meant to get married it would have to be with the very man that she violated for such were the laws of Sumotorion society which her aunt relentlessly ingrained over the years. Upon approaching the kitchen see heard the noise of someone making a sandwich.

She tiptoes past Lucius who was eating a midnight snack to settle his stomach, head to the well just on the outer corridor in the royal garden which was just past the kitchen. She then prepares to fill up her canteen and takes a drink. She then prepares the canteens for her men so they can leave as early as possible. She then looks at the stars wondering why cruel fate had brought her back to her former flare.

"Alas cruel fate has yet to scoff at me yet again. As much as I try to run away from my past it always haunts me like a stalking monster. If love is what fate has in store or not can there be a mere hint to ease the pain of my aching heart." said Danielle to herself.

"Don't worry my dear for I may have the answers to your problems." said Morgaine who was in the middle of trying to look into her own future to see what is in store.

"Thank you madam soothsayer for any answer will do to ease the burden that I carry."

Morgaine then reads Danielle's palm noticing that unlike most women that it was firm and rough from years of exercise and doing chores.

"I see. Very interesting. It seems to me that during your journey you will find a lost love, however he will be faced to make a decision between you and two others. One of the women however will find a lost loved one that dissuades her from marrying the man. The other woman however will try anything to marry this man for her own personal gain. However, when you arrive in Fatlantis the man will finally chose a wife. The woman he chooses though is from his youth who was thought to dead. I also foresee that you and the man having several children and ruling in a land that is struggling to establish itself among the three kingdoms. Take heed my dear for the journey you are on will be full of strife for many challenges await you."

"Thank you for clearing that up for me madam. What is your name so I may thank you properly?" asked Danielle.

"I am Morgaine the Soothsayer of Fantasmia." replied Morgaine.

"Thank you. If you need a favor just let me know and I should repay you."

"The man who lost his memory. Allow me to help him regain it so he can return to his loved ones."

"Consider it done. For you are probably the woman of which you speak who will find her lost loved one. Yet fate isn't set in stone until it occurs, but I will keep your words close if your vision holds true. Goodnight Madam Morgaine for I have I feeling that our paths will cross again."

Danielle heads back to the guest quarters and has a goodnight's rest. She then wakes up the next morning and bids farewell to Mountania promising to return when her sport develops more of a favorable reputation. When she is about to leave she notices that Lucius , Achilles and Morgaine were getting ready to go to Fantasmia. She and her men then make arrangements to travel with the noble lord for the road between here and Fantasmia is full of bandits ready to loot any passerby. Despite learning how to use the sword during her exile into Sumotorio she thought it would be best if the two parties join for strength in numbers will deter most crooks. As they left Lady Juno and her men followed them waiting for a chance to whisk Lucius into her clutches. However it turn out that the young Prince Triton with a few guards had decided to take a stroll in the country side so he might add onto to his desire for strength and knowledge for he believed that to understand what it means to be a noble he must understand his countrymen and neighbors. He also looked up to his Uncle Lucius believing that he was the the type of man that he wanted to be kind, gentle, smart and strong.
154231222111112221.title: Kindred Spirits

choices: Morgaine works with Arthur to help him get his memory
Lady Juno tries to seduce Lucius but fails
1542312221111122211.content:
"Awe man! I wished I had never of gotten separated from my guards. Gladius was of no help either. He intentionally told me the wrong way back to the castle. What's worse is that I've been wondering around for hours now. For all I know it would take half a day or more to find a town close to home." said Triton in a disappointed tone.

The young prince was about to give up until he heard some familiar voices up ahead.

"That's Uncle Lucius!" Maybe he can help me find my way back a Ferremount!" cheered Triton.

"So let me get this straight bro. The woman from Sumotorio is actually Danielle? The very same one who was thought to be dead all these years? Sounds like the O'Boom family had been holding out for all these years then huh." said Achilles.

"The reason they spread word of my death is because my mother disowned me. Yet to me this seems like fate is just trying to toy with us. If only..." Danielle is cut off when she remembers that because of her foolishness that her child was never born.

"Are you ok Danielle?" asked Lucius knowing that she probably had to suffer the same burden that he felt.

"Listen. Does anyone else hear that? It sounds like a little boy who lost his way is calling for assistance." said Morgaine's amnesiac husband who doesn't remember his own name.

"That's Triton! What is he doing this far away from Ferremount?" pondered Lucius.

"Looks like we'll have to take him with us to Fantasmia." said Morgaine.

"I'm sure that my nephews and nieces can entertain the lad while we do our business." replied Danielle.

"Uncle Lucius! I'm glad to have found you. I was on a stroll through the countryside with some guards until I got separated when I was trying to help a couple fix their cart. Unfortunately my poor sense of direction caused me to run into my brother Gladius who probably pointed me in the wrong direction. Given to how late it is and the fact that I'm only a fledgling means I would become prey to either bandits or a wild animal if I hadn't run into you." said Triton.

"When we get to town send a letter off from a carrying pigeon so your father knows that you're safe and will be traveling with me for a while until I can escort you back home." replied Lucius.

"Thank you Uncle Lucius. Travelling with you will help me get not only wiser but stronger as well. If we have time can you train me how to use a sword? Many of the knights tried but gave up once I hesitated." replied Triton.

"Sure thing. We just need to get to town and tomorrow afternoon I'll train you." said Lucius.

Triton then hugs his uncle thankful for his support and kindness. This made Lucius and Danielle smile knowing that the lad is safe from harm.

"Seeing this makes me remember that I definitely had a daughter. What was her name again. Yet what was the name of my wife? How can I try to remember that when I don't remember my own name." said Morgaine's amnesiac husband.

"Your name's Arthur. I have a sword of yours that has your name on it." said Morgaine showing Arthur the sword.

Upon seeing the sword Arthur remembers his name.

"I remember now. My name's Arthur. Yet now I just got to remember the rest of my past. Thank you madam. If you can work with me I'll eventually remember who I was so I can return to my family. I've been gone for over three months ever since that Luck Dragon beat the snot out of me." said Arthur.

"I'm sure that your wife and daughter will be thrilled once they see you." said Morgaine who was glad that her husband was starting to regain his memory.

Lucius and co stop at the border town of Eisenwald for the night. Tritons sends a carrier pigeon with a letter to Ferremount that would explain why he's missing. Lady Juno and her men managed to track Lucius down in hopes of seducing him away from his teenage sweetheart. The next day...
1542312221111122211.title: Lost in the Woods

choices: Lucius eats more than usual at the feast due to being madly in love
Danielle and Lucius dance the night away and enjoy the feast
15423122211111222111.content:
The next day Lucius and his party get ready to head out but not before encountering Lady Juno.

"Fancy meeting you here Lucius. You left without saying good-bye yesterday. I believe that you had urgent business to attend to." said Lady Juno trying to pull a fast one on Lucius.

"I need to broker a deal between king Reginald and my brother for trading agreements. What are you doing here? replied Lucius who was starting to get annoyed by Lady Juno's flirtation.

"I'm going for the Star Light Festival. I've heard that it's breathtaking." lied Lady Juno.

"That sounds like a perfect idea before we negotiation the trade agreement." said Achilles.

"Oh, boy! That sounds like fun. I've read about it in the history of Fantasmia. There's even a folk legend that says that amazing things happen if one was to shoot upon a shooting star." said Triton enthusiastically.

"I completely forgot about that. My sister Alexandria has always wanted me to see it. She even claims that's where she met her husband King Reginald." commented Danielle.

"No way, that's when I met my husband as well." replied Morgaine.

"Weird, for some reason I remember meeting my wife there as well. Wait a minute. Are you insisting that I'm your husband? If such is the case I hope to remember sooner so my mind can be cleared of this confusion." said Arthur.

"Don't worry Fantasmia has the best remedies for dealing for memory loss." said Morgaine hopeful that her husband might fully regain his memory.

Lucius and his party arrive in the capital of Fantasmia, Magicspire. As soon as they walk through the shopping plaza they are greeted by Queen Alexandria.

"Dani! It's been a year since I last saw you! And I see Lord Lucius is with you as well. Don't tell me you two are finally getting married after all these years?" said Alexandria in a humorous tone.

"We're not even sure about any that at the moment." replied Lucius and Danielle simultaneously.

"It seems to me that Lord Lucius will propose at anytime. Soon I'll probably be calling him Brother Lucius, right Achilles?" said Alexandria in a joking manner.

"Now that you mention it you're probably right my friend. Soon I might have to call you and Reggie brother and sister." remarked Achilles in agreement with the Fantasmian queen.

"Guys please! It's too early to be cracking jokes." said Lucius and Danielle simultaneously.

"You must be Lady Juno the sharp shooter. I've heard of your exploits on the field as a ranger. I happen to have a nephew who would like to know you. He's even the same age as you as well. Even though he was born in Fatlantis he's probably the most handsome young men around. I even have a picture of him." said Alexandria holding up a picture of a young mountanian man with his mother and siblings.

"Oh my, he's gorgeous!" said Lady Juno who started to formulate a new plan of playing Lucius and ditching him for the strapping man in the picture.

"Let's head to the palace so we can get your rooms ready and prepare for the festival. You'll have to wait three days though before conducting business since the people are overjoyed to prepare a great feast and to commemorate our anniversary. Yet if during your visit if either of you sulk and express a woe is me attitude about your past there will be no trade agreement and no demonstration. Do you two love birds understand?" said Queen Alexandria.

"Yes ma'am." replied both Lucius and Danielle.

"Good, we shall head to the palace at once."

Once at the palace Lucius and Danielle get set up in their guest rooms along with the rest of the party. Lucius then takes Triton training along with Achilles, Danielle, and her guards, while Lady Juno went off to buy the sexiest clothes she could find and Morgaine and Arthur are in the library trying to piece his memory back together.

"So how are we going to get my memory back again?" questioned Arthur.

"I'll ask you whether certain events to see if you can remember them." said Morgaine.

"That sounds fair to me madam."

"Do you remember my name?"

"What kind of question is that? Didn't we just meet unless you're saying you're my wife. Tell me your name and I'll confirm whether I know it or not."

"The name's Morgaine. Does that ring a bell?"

"Let's see. It sounds familiar now that I think about it. So Morgaine darling when did we meet? I know it was at this upcoming festival but I don't know whether it was a few years ago or a year ago."

"We meet six years ago."

"I remember but other than that my memory is foggy. I've promised Lady O'Boom that I help her for her demonstration if we can do this later tonight during the festival that would be great. It might help me to do that darling." said Arthur who kissed his wife on the cheek.

"All right sweetheart. Just be sure you are ready for tonight's events." said Morgaine poking Arthur's massive arms.

Later that night.

choices: The next day Lucius trains Triton and learns Sumotorion Wrestling as well
Lady Juno toys with Lucius with the intent of putting him to shame
154231222111112221112.content:
The Star Light Festival was kicked off with a great feast. Lucius struck with love ate more than usual but not without asking Danielle to a dance. Seeing the two dance Alexandria, Reginald, and Achilles along with Crown Princess Madison, her twin Theodora and younger twin brothers Alexander and Michael and Triton were enjoying the festivities.

"It's great not seeing my poor older sister work herself to death. The poor woman is definitely not the harlot that Malice, Ebony, and my mother has painted her to be. Unfortunately, my nephew, Augustus who never took advantage of a woman continues to make a pervert of himself with his warped fantasies of women taking advantage of men to add to them their harem as he calls it. That's why the man needs to grow up and take a wife. But with Lady Valeropetra trying to ensnare Lucius as her toy to later run off with another younger man has me worried. But I believe that Lucius and Danielle will make up for lost time and that Lady Valeropetra would indeed run off with Augustus. For her reaction to his picture was the only sign that proves my theory. But this isn't proper to talk about such things. Hey Achilles I've got word from Livia that you're expecting another child."

"That's right how'd you know Alex?"

"I write to Livia all the time. Yet I can imagine it now. No telling that when the child gets older that our kids will try to shoot off fireworks again inside the castle. Reggie and I had to hide them ever since so they don't try it again. He also had them write a paragraph of how it's dangerous, right love?" said Alexandria poking her husband lovingly on his huge stomach.

"Alex my sweet isn't it time that sooner or later we tell our guests about our coming bundles of joy?" said Reginald rubbing his wife's belly.

"According to Mum we'll be getting another brother and sister." cheered Crown Princess Madison like any other 6 year old her age.

"That's right sweetie and your great grand Mum will be proud for two more additions to our large family. I might have to pay them and my cousins a visit before I broker this deal in Mountania. We'll have to show you guys our new magic swords that the young Merlin invented. Since Mountania faces chaos from bandits and The overpopulation of Luck Dragons as of late. For if I remember there has to be a balance between the two or else the kingdom would go into chaos. Triton is it true that when Cassius becomes king that he wishes to abolish slavery?"

"Sorry your majesty, I was in awe of how gracefully that Uncle Lucius and his friend were dancing. Yet it appears to me that he manages to snag an appetizer or two when ever they dance past the tables in the courtyard. Yet the view is beautiful though. It's true that Cassius does have such wishes but he mother and father always get into a heated debate with mother taking his side and dad disagreeing." said Triton.

"That's my bro. Levi for you." said Achilles.

"It is romantic that they are enjoying their time under the stars. Shall we dear?"

"Indeed sweetheart. Has anyone seen Lady Juno or Madam Morgaine and her husband Arthur?"

"They're in the observatory taliking to some of our other guests. This brings back memories when Mum was pleased that we met. I believe I was 18 and you were 19. But let us remember by following Lucius's and Danielle's example." said Alexandria helping up her husband.

Mean while Lucius and Danielle were preoccupied dancing to notice their family talking about them.

"Lucius my friend I've never felt so alive in ages."

"Same here Danielle. I don't want to rush things but would you like to court me again? I can't help but think of you all the time. My heart is racing like it never has before."

15511.content:
It was another day in Ferramount. Queen Athena was training her best pupil how to use a shotgun in the royal shooting range. Her name was Lady Ariel Crossheart a 15 year old with beautiful strawberry-blonde hair and emerald eyes. Standing at a height of 6'1" inches she was tall for a girl her age but that was due to her family where everyone is almost as tall as the members of the royal family. She was skilled at swordplay and archery. Ariel shoots the bulls-eye of the target with each shot. Thanks to her mastery of archery.

"Impressive Lady Crossheart. That concludes today's lesson."

"Thank you your grace." said Ariel giving a curtsy.

Since her family's mansion was on the other side of Ferramount Ariel and her cousins were able to go to the royal palace daily. Her youngest cousin was training under General Lucina Knox. Despite Gabriella being talented she always can't focus if a crowd is watching her. So Ariel was tasked by her mother Callisto and her father Drake to help Gabriella get over that issue. She then notices several of the servant boys staring at her.

"It's Ariel Crossheart. She's so cute. Hopefully she'll ask me out. Dude she's just sexy." commented the boys.

"Sorry guys but I'm just trying to pick up my cousin from training. Good day gentlemen."

Ariel walks down the corridor to make sure the boys aren't following her. The last time literally every teenage boy from the palace to the market place followed her home. It didn't help that her cousin Vanessa Blackfire called her the walking boy magnet with fake beauty. Little did she know that she was walking into one of Gladius's pranks. Ariel is then caught by the tripwire and found herself hanging upside down unintentionally revealing the panties under her skirt. She then she Gladius laughing.

"That's classic! I can't believe you fell for that. Nice underwear by the way." said Gladius laughing.

"You are so going to pay for this Gladius! Once I cut myself down prepare yourself!"

"Gladius! Cut her down this instant!"

"F-father!?"

"Are you dumb boy! Cut her down this instant or else I'll make you clean the stables and clean my armor for a year!"

"It's too late I already cut myself down. There's no way he'll get away with this. If I may my lord if I can teach this prankster a lesson myself. For surely a prince like Gladius losing to a woman in a sword fight would be much more embarrassing."

"Very well Lady Crossheart. Tomorrow at noon you shall have you wish."

"Thank you your majesty." said Ariel doing a curtsy.

That's probably the second time today one of those boys got into a situation where they had to issue or an accept a duel from a woman. Yet Lady Blackfire challenged Cassius because she stole his armor while he was washing up and now Lady Ariel because Gladius couldn't keep out of trouble. Hopefully Gladius learns from this and grows up for once. Yet Cassius definitely proved victorious over Lady Blackfire today. Why can't Gladius just behave. Thought King Leviathan.

Meanwhile Ariel picked up her younger cousin who was playing with Triton with practice swords.

"Okay Gabby time to say bye to Triton."

"See you tomorrow." said Gabriella to Triton who was shocked that he lost to a girl in their game of a mock duel.

"Bye." says Triton dumbfounded at what to say.

Just before leaving Ariel runs into Cassius. Suddenly filled with thoughts of love she is at a lost of words.

"Hey Ariel can't wait to see you show my brother why he shouldn't treat a lady." said Cassius blushing.

"Thanks. Maybe we can... uh... go hunting together after all this." said Ariel blushing.

"Okay Saturday we'll go. said Cassius as if the girl of his dreams just asked him out.

Ariel then goes to home and tells her parents about what happened.

The next day...

Minerva was probably a year or two younger than Ariel but the two acted like sisters until Cassius walked by that is. The duel between Ariel and Gladius was underway. Gladius took the first move only for Ariel to dodge.

"What's the matter Gladius? Afraid to hit a girl?"

"Oh dear, with that ego of yours you could lose it anytime. The key to victory is to not let your opponent get to you."

"If I lose Pops will totally make me clean the army's equipment for the next three months or worse he'll ship me off to my Uncle Lucius in Fatlantis."

"Lord Lucius? Cassius and Triton speak highly of him every time despite your father's and grandfather's grudge against the poor soul. Yet there have been rumors though of a mysterious woman named Danielle O'Boom who has been spotted in a country in the west. Whether it's the same one who knows. If it is then she was probably disinherited like Lucius." said Ariel while blocking Gladius's swings.

This is so awkward. Yet again in another love-triangle. I'll just invite Ariel to the hunting trip and then hang out with Minerva. We are friends after all.

15521.content:
In a kingdom to the west of Mountania surrounded by water with only a bridge to travel upon or through the sea was a new nation trying to develop itself. It was founded by King Richard who was once a Prince of Fatlantis long ago who decided to find a new land to explore and indulge upon. So with a group from Fatlantis, Fantasmia, and Mountania the first king and people from all three nations settled their. The land of Sumotorio was rich with delacacies enough to help the first king grow in girth. As the years passed the royal bloodline finally mingled Mountanian blood meaning that the kings are not only extremely fat but toned as well. It was this mixing of the nations that the national sport of Sumotorion wrestling developed which was a mix of Fatlantean sumo wrestling, Mountainian free style and the rules developed by Fantasmian study. The current ruler of the nation is Queen Natilda Steel who took a vow of celibacy shortly after her late husband Samson died at the clutches of a luck dragon. Her only heir was her eldest niece Lady Danielle O'Boom.

Now as a girl Danielle had learned some swordplay and was once engaged to Lucius who was crown prince of Mountainia at the time. Yet it was that very past that she regretted most of all. She regretted the times that she went on those midnight strolls for they eventually led to trouble. She was only 17 at the time and Lucius 16 when she first ruined her life. Lucius was in the middle of taking a bath when she decided to jump in fully clothed. Lucius tried to stop her but she just wanted to let the sparks fly. So she caused him to violate himself by impregnating her. When she found out that she was with child she decided to end it all so she wouldn't have to face both Mountanian and Fatlantean officials so she decided to drink poison. It almost worked when a Fantasmian mage happened to show up right after she drank. The next day after she recovered her mother who was furious decided that since her daughter acted foolishly and didn't want to be part of the family that she decided to disown Danielle. Her middle siblings Malice and Ebony mocked her when they heard this. Her father was upset that he didn't come see his daughter before she left to go off to her Aunt Natilda.

Her mother then spread word that Danielle was dead even though the unborn baby was the only person to die. This convinced all three kingdoms of her supposed death even though the O'Boom family left to visit Sumotorio almost yearly. Yet Alexandria being the youngest sister didn't hold Danielle's teenage years against her for she was too young to remember. So over the years Danielle under the strict supervision of her Aunt Natilda was not allowed to leave the country until she was ready to right her wrongs or said otherwise. When first exiled the only thing that Danielle could find solace in was chores. So over the years she became a workaholic which was her only vice other than that she was honored for her good character. Yet at age 39 she had rejected almost every suitor in Sumotorio. She currently resides In Terramount the capital of Sumotorio. Yet it was starting to become known to only a few people in the other kingdoms that she was alive but unfortunately her former flare still believed the story that was woven by the O'Booms.

Danielle was sitting in front of the fireplace drinking some tea while looking at her locket. She has a strong busty stature and stood at 9' tall being the shortest in her family. Her face had freckles and dazzling but sad blue eyes and long blond hair. She was enjoying her solitude until a servant came in.

"My dear lady come quickly for Zantar found an unconscious man from Mountainia."

"Very well, I shall see to it at once."

When Danielle arrived she was horrified beyond belief. The man was semiconscious but he had terrible burns and scratches which would fortunately heal with the advanced medicine and magic of Sumotorio.

"Who is this man?"

"I don't know my lady for when I found him in that hole in on Mount Volosion on the Triple border. He had no memory at all except that he was attacked by a Luck Dragon and that he had a wife and child whose names he doesn't remember. He was seen carrying a Douglas Pine wand and a dagger. By the looks of it he's of both Mountanian and Fantasmian blood. His scratches should heal in a few days but the burns will heal just like new in a few months as long as he uses this powerful medicine I made mixed of the most potent magical ingredients from our land and what I found at the Triple border."

"Thank you Zantar. Well let him recover until he's well enough then we'll find his loved ones for I believe that if we return him to his native country."

Danielle now pondered if this could be a sign that it was time to let go of the past and make things right. She had heard from his sister that Lucius had out on a lot of weight but kept up with his training and that he was just as lonely as Danielle. But if Danielle was going to the three kingdoms it would be to help this amnesiac and to spread her sport for maybe that can justify her past. If she happened to find love with Lucius again after so long than it shall be. The next day...

info.brief_description: Meet the Family Van Draconis, Rulers of all Mountania!
info.description:
This story is the sequel to "Royal Fatness" and "Princes of Fatlantis".

Royal Fatness is located here:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1499268-Royal-Fatness

Princes of Fatlantis is located here:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1572820-Princes-of-Fatlantis

The wiki for these stories is located here:
http://royalandprinces.wikispaces.com/

*****This story takes place about 100 years after the adventures in "Princes of Fatlantis" have occurred.*****

The Mountanian Royal family consists of:

King Leviathan, age 36
Queen Athena, age 33
Crown Prince Cassius, 15; Prince Gladius, 13; Prince Triton, 10.

Other characters will be added as the story grows, including:

Merlin, the young wizard, age 15, who is the great-grandson of Draxon.

The main difference is that this story has as main focus the Royal family of the Kingdom of Mountania, which is located north of Fatlantis. The capital of Mountania is Ferramount, where the large royal palace is located as well.

Furthermore, the setting for this story is a whole generation in the future, so the creation of new characters is possible.

The Mountanians are a people of hard workers, miners and traders. They are warriors and craftsmen. They also trade in slaves and they hunt, fish, and maintain a large standing army consisting of strong men who are willing to fight for their country. But Mountanians are also servants, who send out their young men to other towns and villages to work on the farms, in the mines, and to provide security to the people and the royal families of Fatlantis and of Fantasmia.

Please check out the story and enjoy!
